sentence.Network_en: She never lost her respect for the idealism of the 1960s.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对20世纪60年代的理想主义一直心怀崇敬。

sentence.Network_en: He was full of youthful idealism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他满脑子都是年轻人的理想主义。

sentence.Network_en: They're channelling the natural resources of youthful idealism into political action.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们正在把青年固有的那种充满理想的热情引导到政治活动中去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 理想 - 搜搜百科 ... 幻境;理想国 cloudland 理想主义 idealism 表征;理想 oriflamme.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... ideal n 理想 idealism n 唯心主义 idealize b 理想化.
便是唯心论（idealism）和唯物论（Materialism）。注：另外与传统客观概念相关的，就是带有神圣光环的三位一体—「信度、效度、 …
观念论（idealism）有时也称为唯心主义、唯心论、理想主义。包括主观唯心主义与客观唯心主义两种主要形态。

白石藏之介_百度百科 ... S=successful 成功的 i=ideal 理想的 r=rational 理智的.
理想化(idealization),2.普遍化(permeation),3.类别化(categorization).29 所谓理想化是指假设历史上存在有某一段时期,其中个人与社.
英语单词立体记忆 ... → ideal 理想的，完美的 → ideally 理想地，理论上地 → identify 认出，识别.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent. (in sense 2): from French idéalisme or German Idealismus, from late Latin idealis (see ideal)

entry.def: Idealism is the beliefs and behaviour of someone who has ideals and who tries to base their behaviour on these ideals.

example.ex: She never lost her respect for the idealism of the 1960s...
example.tran: 她对 20 世纪 60 年代的理想主义一直心怀崇敬。

example.ex: This experience has tempered their idealism.
example.tran: 这次经历锻炼了他们的理想主义。

means.word_mean: 1. (philosophy) the philosophical theory that ideas are the only reality
2. impracticality by virtue of thinking of things in their ideal form rather than as they really are
3. elevated ideals or conduct; the quality of believing that ideals should be pursued

auth_sentence.content: The idealism of some of them is really inspiring.
auth_sentence.res_content: The idealism of some of them is really inspiring.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The idealism of some of them is really inspiring.

auth_sentence.content: German idealism in politics may have seen its final days.
auth_sentence.res_content: German idealism in politics may have seen its final days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: German idealism in politics may have seen its final days.

auth_sentence.content: It wasn't technology, and it wasn't idealism.
auth_sentence.res_content: It wasn't technology, and it wasn't idealism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It wasn't technology, and it wasn't idealism.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"具备某种性质"; 2. 表示"学术或学术流派,行业"; 3. 表示"行为,现象,状态"; 4. 表示"疾病"; 5. 名词,表示"各种主义,宗教"

stems_affixes.word_buile: absurb荒唐的+ism具备某种性质→n.荒诞主义
ant=anti反对,对抗+agon斗争+ism具备某种性质→n.对抗,敌对
brutal残忍的,兽性的+ism具备某种性质→n.兽性
human人+ism具备某种性质→n.人道主义
mech机器+an+ism具备某种性质→n.机械装置,机构,机制
atom原子+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.原子说,原子论
fatal命运注定的+ism学术或学术流派→n.宿命论

stems_affixes.value_cn: 印象派艺术家,印象流派
stems_affixes.word_buile: impression印象+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.印象派艺术家,印象流派
journal杂志,日报+ism行业→n.新闻业,报章杂志
magnet磁体,磁铁+ism学术→n.磁;魅力;催眠术
modern现代的+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.现代主义,现代派

stems_affixes.value_cn: 老师气质[派头],儿童教学法

socrat=+ism学术或学术流派,行业→n.苏格拉底哲学

stems_affixes.value_cn: 野蛮,未开化,原始,不文明

cannibal食人者,吃同类的动物+ism行为,现象,状态→n.同类相食

gigant巨大的+ism行为,现象,状态→n.[医]巨人症
method方法+ism行为,现象,状态→n.默守成规
plagiar斜的+ism行为,现象,状态→做不正当的事
sch=schist+ism行为,现象,状态→n.组织分裂
sex性别+ism行为,现象,状态→n.性别歧视
tour旅游+ism行为,现象,状态→n.旅游业
albin=albino白化病者+ism疾病→n.[医]白化病,皮肤变白症
alcohol酒精+ism疾病→n.酒精中毒
a无+stigma斑点+tism=ism疾病→n.散光
atav祖先+ism疾病→n.[生]隔代遗传,返祖现象
Dalton道尔顿[英国研究色盲的化学家、物理学家]+ism疾病→n.先天性色盲,红绿色盲
rheum稀黏液+at+ism疾病→n.风湿病
Buddh=Buddha佛+ism各种主义,宗教→n.佛教,释教
capital资本+ism各种主义,宗教→n.资本主义
Catholic天主教的+ism各种主义,宗教→n.天主教义;天主教

Confucian孔子的+ism各种主义,宗教→n.孔教,儒教

ideal[adj.理想的;空想的;理想主义的;唯心的 n.理想]+ism主义→n.唯心主义;理想主义
